La Favorita [arr. Godfrey]
Prudhoe, Northumberland
Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8. March contest(own choice) 1st (£2) Boldon Colliery, 2nd (£1)Crookhall Colliery. Promoted by Prudhoe Flower Show. 7 bands competed.
